metadata.title: CVE-2015-8651 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
Integer overflow in Adobe Flash Player before 18.0.0.324 and 19.x and 20.xbefore 20.0.0.267 on Windows and OS X and before 11.2.202.559 on Linux,Adobe AIR before 20.0.0.233, Adobe AIR SDK before 20.0.0.233, and Adobe AIRSDK & Compiler before 20.0.0.233 allows attackers to execute arbitrary codevia unspecified vectors.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8651` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

flashplugin-downloader - 11.2.202.559ubuntu0.14.04.1
flashplugin-installer - 11.2.202.559ubuntu0.14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: flashplugin-nonfree package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '11.2.202.559ubuntu0.14.04.1').
